author: Giulia Bottaro
title: Disney lures wave of streaming subscribers as Netflix falters

author: Ryan FaughnderStaff Writer
title: Disney+ avoids streaming slump for now, adding 8 million subscribers

sentence: On the earnings call, Disney CEO Bob Chapek was surprisingly not asked about the company's public battle with Florida Governor Ron DeSantis, who after Disney vowed to fight the , or what critics have dubbed the "Don't Say Gay" bill.
title: Disney erases after-hours gains despite subscriber beat, Q2 earnings miss estimates
